newsitem.title: USA: ICG in pact with Southern Co.
newsitem.headline: ICG in pact with Southern Co.

text.p: ICG Communications Inc said Wednesday that its wholly-owned subsidiary, ICG Telecom Group, has entered into an agreement with a subsidiary of Southern Co to construct a 100-mile fiber optic network in the Atlanta metropolitan area.

The fiber optic network is to be used by ICG to provide local exchange services in Atlanta. Construction on the network is expected to start in the third quarter of this year and be completed in 1998.
The agreement with Southern is the second such effort with ICG. In April of 1996, the two companies announced plans for a joint project in Birmingham, Ala.
Southern Co is the largest producer of electricity in the United States. ICG is a local exchange carrier.
